SA15dhkhetuu:86: pakṣa-dharmas tad-aṃśena vyāpto hetus tridhā eva saḥ /
SA15dhkhetuu:96: cet, na, dṛṣṭānta-dharmiṇo api pratyāsatteḥ. tad-aṃśa-vyāptyā
SA15dhkhetuu:98: parigrahaḥ. siddhe api punar-vacanaṃ niyama-artham āśaṅkyeta.
SA15dhkhetuu:99: sajātīya eva sattvam iti siddhe api tad-abhāve vyatireke
SA15dhkhetuu:101: api dṛṣṭānta-dharmiṇi sattve dharmi-vacanaṃ tatra eva bhāva-
SA15dhkhetuu:102: niyama-artham āśaṅkyeta. tasmāt sāmarthyād artha-gatāv apy
SA15dhkhetuu:104: bhavati. pakṣasya dharmatve tad-viśeṣaṇa-apekṣasya anyatra ananuvṛtter
SA15dhkhetuu:108: yathā caitro dhanurdhara iti na anyayogavyavacchedena yathā
SA15dhkhetuu:111: vyāptir vyāpakasya tatra bhāva eva vyāpyasya vā
SA15dhkhetuu:113: etena anvayo vyatireko vā pakṣa-dharmaś ca yathāsvaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:121: vā kṛtakatvasya. sadhūmaṃ hi pradeśam arthāntara-vivikta-rūpam
SA15dhkhetuu:124: tatra yad ādyam asādhāraṇa-viṣayaṃ darśanaṃ tad
SA15dhkhetuu:126: tasmin tathābhūte dṛṣṭe sati sa yena yena asādhāraṇas
SA15dhkhetuu:129: pramāṇam, prāg asādhāraṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā asādhāraṇa ity abhilapato
SA15dhkhetuu:132: ca anumāna-vat. arthakriyā-arthī hi sarvaḥ pramāṇam apramāṇaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:136: vikalpa-vijñāna-grāhyaṃ yathā nīlaṃ dṛṣṭvā nīlam iti
SA15dhkhetuu:137: jñāne. tad eva hi nīla-svalakṣaṇaṃ tathāvidha-sādhya-arthakriyākāri,
SA15dhkhetuu:138: tac ca tena ātmanā dṛṣṭam eva pratyakṣeṇa. na ca
SA15dhkhetuu:141: pramāṇam ity apy anadhigate svalakṣaṇa iti viśeṣanīyam.
SA15dhkhetuu:142: adhigate tu svalakṣaṇe tat-sāmarthya-janmā vikalpas tad-anukārī
SA15dhkhetuu:143: kāryatas tad-viṣayatvāt smṛtir eva na pramāṇam,
SA15dhkhetuu:157: nānā-yogakṣematvāt. sādhāraṇe hi kārye na teṣāṃ sāmarthya-bhedaḥ,
SA15dhkhetuu:164: yathā yat sat tat kṣaṇikam eva,
SA15dhkhetuu:167: siddhiḥ, yathā idam asya upalambha upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-prāptaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:170: asya abhāve na bhavati iti yas tad-bhāve bhāvas tad-abhāve
SA15dhkhetuu:172: tasya siddhiḥ. kāryakāraṇabhāva eva hy arthāntarasya evaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:173: syāt yatra dhūmas tatra avaśyam agniḥ,
SA15dhkhetuu:175: eva hi bhāvo dhūmasya tat-kāryatvam. anupalabdhāv apy
SA15dhkhetuu:184: abhāva-khyāpanaṃ apratibandha-mātra-siddhau sidhyati iti na tatra
SA15dhkhetuu:188: etal-lakṣaṇas tridhā eva so hetus triprakāra eva, svabhāvaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:189: kāryam anupalabdhiś ca iti yathā anitye kasmiṃścit sādhye sattvam
SA15dhkhetuu:190: agnimati pradeśe dhūmo abhāve ca upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-prāptasya anupalabdhir
SA15dhkhetuu:191: ity atra eva trividhe avinābhāva-niyamāt. pakṣa-dharmasya
SA15dhkhetuu:194: anyatra na asti ity atra eva niyata ucyate.
SA15dhkhetuu:200: dharmaṃ svabhāvam icchanti. viśeṣaṇena tathāvidhasya atat-
SA15dhkhetuu:201: svabhāvatāṃ tasmin sādhye hetor vyabhicāraṃ ca āha, yathā
SA15dhkhetuu:205: yathā yat sat tat sarvaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ yathā ghaṭa-ādayaḥ saṃś
SA15dhkhetuu:210: atra sāmarthyād eva pratijñā-arthasya pratīter na pratijñāyāḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:211: prayogaḥ. apradarśite prameye arthe kathaṃ tat-pratītir iti cet.
SA15dhkhetuu:212: svayaṃ pratipattau prameyasya ka upadarśayitā. pradeśa-sthaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:213: dhūmam upalabdhavatas tasya agninā vyāpteḥ smaraṇe tat-sāmarthyād
SA15dhkhetuu:214: eva agnir atra iti pratītir bhavati. na ca tatra kaścid
SA15dhkhetuu:215: agnir atra ity asmai nivedayati. na api prāg eva pratipadyate
SA15dhkhetuu:216: kiṃcit, pramāṇam antareṇa evaṃ pratīter nimitta-abhāvāt.
SA15dhkhetuu:217: pratītau liṅgasya vaiyarthyaṃ. svayam eva akasmād
SA15dhkhetuu:218: agnir atra iti prameyaṃ vyavasthāpya paścāt tat-pratipattaye
SA15dhkhetuu:219: liṅgam anusarati iti ko ayaṃ pratipatteḥ kramaḥ. pareṇa api
SA15dhkhetuu:223: tena eva tāvad darśitena ko arthaḥ. yadi
SA15dhkhetuu:226: pratītau vinā api kenacid viṣaya-upasthāpakena pratiyan asmān
SA15dhkhetuu:227: kāryiṇo dṛṣṭvā parvabrāhmaṇa iva vyaktaṃ mūlyaṃ mṛgayate.
SA15dhkhetuu:228: asmad-vacanād api svayaṃ siddham eva liṅgam anusṛtya
SA15dhkhetuu:229: pratyeti iti ko anayor avasthayor viśeṣaḥ. dṛṣṭā ca pakṣa-dharma-
SA15dhkhetuu:231: iti kas tasya upayogaḥ. sva-niścaya-vad anyeṣām api niścaya-utpādanāya
SA15dhkhetuu:234: antareṇa api pratipadya paraṃ pratipādayan apūrvam
SA15dhkhetuu:235: artha-kramam āśrayata iti kim atra kāraṇam. tasmān na prameya-
SA15dhkhetuu:242: nimīlya cintaya tāvat kim iyatā pratītiḥ syān na vā. bhāve
SA15dhkhetuu:250: dharma-bhede tathā api tad-bhāvasya eva khyāpanāt. na hy
SA15dhkhetuu:251: atat-svabhāvasya bhāva ekāntena anyabhāvaḥ kṛtakatvasya bhāve
SA15dhkhetuu:254: tasya nivṛttir yathā anayor eva dharmayor nivṛttiḥ. tasmād
SA15dhkhetuu:255: anvaya-vyatirekayor yathā-lakṣaṇam eko api prayukto dvitīyam
SA15dhkhetuu:256: ākṣipati iti na ekatra sādhana-vākye dvayoḥ prayoga iṣyate,
SA15dhkhetuu:259: tad-abhāve abhāva-siddhau ca anvayasya api siddheḥ.
SA15dhkhetuu:260: tad-abhāva eva abhāva-khyātir yathā syān na anyatra viruddhe
SA15dhkhetuu:261: vā iti niyama-khyāpana-artho api vyatireka-prayogo na yuktaḥ,
SA15dhkhetuu:263: katham idam avagamyate sad avaśyaṃ naśvara-svabhāvam iti
SA15dhkhetuu:271: eva karoti, tasya nivṛtteḥ. na api bhāva-antaram eva,
SA15dhkhetuu:272: bhāva-antara-karaṇe bhāve tad-avasthe na kiṃcit karoti iti tathā-upalabdhy-
SA15dhkhetuu:273: ādi-prasaṅgaḥ. na api bhāva-antaram asya āvaraṇam,
SA15dhkhetuu:275: tasminn āvaraṇasya apy ayogāt. na api vināśa-hetunā bhāva-abhāvaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:279: evaṃ ca akartur ahetutvam iti na vināśa-hetuḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:281: vaiyarthyāc ca. yadi svabhāvato naśvaraḥ svātmany anavasthāyī-
SA15dhkhetuu:284: eva svayaṃ nāśāt. yo hi yat svabhāvaḥ sa sva-hetor
SA15dhkhetuu:290: tadvad asthiti-dharmā cet svabhāvato niṣpanno na punas
SA15dhkhetuu:295: janayanti, tadvad bhāvo api vināśe syād iti. na tat-svabhāvasya
SA15dhkhetuu:296: jananād ajanakasya ca atat-svabhāvatvāt. ata eva
SA15dhkhetuu:299: anyathātva-abhāvāt tat-svabhāvasya paścād iva prāg api
SA15dhkhetuu:300: janana-prasaṅgāt. tasmād yo antyo avasthā-viśeṣaḥ sa eva aṅkura-ādi-
SA15dhkhetuu:305: te antyāḥ samarthāḥ kiṃ na janayanti iti, janayanty
SA15dhkhetuu:306: eva, na atra anyathābhāvaḥ svabhāvasya avaiparītyāt. teṣu sarveṣu
SA15dhkhetuu:307: sahakāriṣu samartha-svabhāveṣu ko aparasya upayoga iti cet, na vai
SA15dhkhetuu:308: bhāvānāṃ kācit prekṣā-pūrva-kāritā yato ayam eko api samarthaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:309: kim asmābhir ity apare nivarteran. nirabhiprāya-vyāpārā
SA15dhkhetuu:311: na upālambham arhanti. samarthāḥ kiṃ na aparāparaṃ janayanti
SA15dhkhetuu:312: iti cet, na, tatra eva sāmarthyāt. tasya eva ekasya janane
SA15dhkhetuu:313: samarthā na anyasya iti na aparāpara-jananam.
SA15dhkhetuu:315: kārya-utpattau na kāraṇa-bhedāt kārya-bhedaḥ syād iti cet,
SA15dhkhetuu:320: vṛkṣa-ādibhyo bhinnaḥ svabhāvaḥ kulālāt tasya eva mṛd-ātmanaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:322: tasya eva mṛt-saṃsthāna-viśeṣa-ātmanaś cakra-āder vibhaktaḥ svabhāvo
SA15dhkhetuu:323: bhavati; tad evaṃ na kulālān mṛt-svabhāvatā, na
SA15dhkhetuu:331: svabhāvaḥ kulāla-mṛt-piṇḍayor upayoga-viṣaya iti cet, uktam
SA15dhkhetuu:332: atra. api ca yadi saṃsthānaṃ bhinnaṃ mṛdaḥ,
SA15dhkhetuu:334: na pṛthak karoti. guṇasya dravya-paratantratvam iti na pṛthak
SA15dhkhetuu:335: karoti. tat-saṃsthāna-ādhāra-ātmakaṃ yadi svabhāvena tad dravyaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:339: vastuna eva yogyatā dharmatā iti prāg api mṛt-piṇḍasya saṃsthāna-
SA15dhkhetuu:341: prasaṅgaḥ. evaṃ tarhi sā yogyatā mṛd-dravyasya kulālād
SA15dhkhetuu:344: asti tāvad eka-svabhāvatve api kasyacid aneka-pratyaya-upadheya-
SA15dhkhetuu:347: tena sahakāriṇaḥ pratyayā na eka-upayoga-viṣayāḥ kārya-
SA15dhkhetuu:348: svabhāvasya ekatve api vastuta iti yathā iha kāraṇa-bhedo bhinna-
SA15dhkhetuu:349: viśeṣa-upayogān na eka-kāryas tathā cakṣur-ādibhyo vijñāna-utpattāv
SA15dhkhetuu:353: tat tulya-rūpatā ity abhinnatve api vastutaḥ kāryasya kāraṇānāṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:354: bhinnebhyaḥ svabhāvebhyo bhinnā eva viśeṣā bhavanti iti na
SA15dhkhetuu:355: kāraṇa-bhede apy abhedas tat-kārya-viśeṣasya. ta eva ete kāraṇa-
SA15dhkhetuu:358: sthity-āśraya ity ucyante. tathā hi tat tebhyaḥ samastebhya
SA15dhkhetuu:360: rūpaṃ ca iti prativiśiṣṭa-svabhāvam ekaṃ jātam.
SA15dhkhetuu:362: pratyayeṣu parasparaṃ kaḥ sahakāra-artha iti cet, na vai
SA15dhkhetuu:363: sarvatra atiśaya-utpādanaṃ sahakriyā. kiṃ tarhi. bahūnāṃ yad
SA15dhkhetuu:368: kāraṇatvāt tatra ca kṣaṇa ekasya svabhāvasya avivekād viśeṣasya
SA15dhkhetuu:371: utpatteḥ. bhāva-antara-utpattāv antyaṃ na syāt, tataś ca na
SA15dhkhetuu:372: sākṣāt kāraṇaṃ syāt. tasmān na kāraṇasya sahakāribhyo viśeṣa-
SA15dhkhetuu:373: utpattiḥ. te samarthāḥ svabhāvato antyāḥ pratyayāḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:374: saha jāyante kṣaṇikā yeṣāṃ prāg-paścāt-pṛthag-bhāvo na asti
SA15dhkhetuu:382: tataś ca eko api kvacid janayed iti
SA15dhkhetuu:384: saṃskārāḥ santanvanto yady api kutaścit sāmyāt sarūpāḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:386: tathā api bhinna eva eṣāṃ svabhāvaḥ;
SA15dhkhetuu:389: tatra yo avyavadhāna-ādi-deśo rūpa-indriya-ādi-kalāpaḥ sa vijñāna-
SA15dhkhetuu:390: janane samartho hetuḥ. yas teṣāṃ paraspara-upasarpaṇa-
SA15dhkhetuu:392: teṣāṃ ca na pūrvaṃ na paścān na pṛthag bhāva iti samarthān
SA15dhkhetuu:393: api pūrva-apara-pṛthag-bhāva-bhāvino doṣā na upalīyante. tena yas
SA15dhkhetuu:394: teṣāṃ paraspara-upasarpaṇa-ādi-hetuḥ sa samarthasya hetur iti tatra
SA15dhkhetuu:395: na kadācid anyathābhāvaḥ. anena nyāyena sarvatra hetu-phala-
SA15dhkhetuu:401: anya-sahitaḥ karoti na kevala iti cet,
SA15dhkhetuu:403: janane samarthaḥ svabhāvo asamartho vā samartha iti cet, kiṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:404: na karoti, akurvan kathaṃ samarthaḥ. kuvinda-ādayaḥ paṭa-ādi-
SA15dhkhetuu:405: kriyāyāṃ samarthā api na sarvadā kurvanti iti cet,
SA15dhkhetuu:408: mūrkhaḥ sukhaidhitaḥ kṛtam api punaḥ punaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:409: kārayati, tathā hy etad bīja-ādy-upanyāse nirloṭhitam. tasmāt
SA15dhkhetuu:417: api ca sa eva tāvat sakala-sahakāri-sahitaḥ kāryaṃ kasmāt
SA15dhkhetuu:419: tena karoti iti brūmaḥ. aho mahā-sāmarthyaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:422: kadācit kiṃcit kathaṃcit atra-bhavanto darśana-patham atikrāmet,
SA15dhkhetuu:424: cintā cittaṃ dunoti. na vai vayam atat-svabhāvānām asmad-darśana-
SA15dhkhetuu:425: vaśāt kārya-kriyāṃ brūmaḥ. kiṃ tarhi. svabhāvena eva te
SA15dhkhetuu:427: tān paśyantaḥ kevalaṃ jānīmahe ta ete
SA15dhkhetuu:431: dharmā, tena samasta-pratyayavatām akṛtvā na upekṣā āpattir iti.
SA15dhkhetuu:432: so akṣepa-kriyā-dharmā svabhāvaḥ kiṃ teṣāṃ tadā eva antya-
SA15dhkhetuu:433: avasthāyām utpanna āhosvit prāg apy āsīt. āsīt,
SA15dhkhetuu:436: virodhāt. tat kim idānīṃ mātā ca vandhyā ca; ko vā asya
SA15dhkhetuu:437: bhāṣitasya artho akṣepa-kriyā-dharmā ca svabhāvo na ca karoti iti.
SA15dhkhetuu:438: sahitas tat-svabhāvo na kevala iti cet,
SA15dhkhetuu:442: na hi sa sāhitye api pararūpeṇa kartā;
SA15dhkhetuu:444: api tad eva iti kathaṃ kadācit kriyā-virāmaḥ. yasya api bhāvaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:445: kṣaṇikas tasya api kasmāt kevalo na karoti,
SA15dhkhetuu:447: kathaṃ na bhavati. kṣaṇikatvāt. uktaṃ yādṛśasya kriyā. sa katham
SA15dhkhetuu:448: eka-kṣaṇa-bhāvy anyathā bhavet. yaś ca bhavati, sa eva na
SA15dhkhetuu:452: yo api manyate akṣepa-kriyā-dharmā eva sa tasya svabhāvaḥ,
SA15dhkhetuu:455: iti sahitebhya eva jāyate na kevalebhya iti, tasya api
SA15dhkhetuu:456: kathaṃ sa kevalo api karoty eva kāryaṃ ca tasmān na utpadyate
SA15dhkhetuu:457: iti tad-avastho virodhaḥ. na kevalaḥ karoty eva iti cet, katham
SA15dhkhetuu:458: idānīm akṣepa-kriyā-svabhāvaḥ. nanv etad eva paridīpitaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:460: kāryaṃ ca ayaṃ kevalo api samarthaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:461: san param apekṣamānaṃ katham upekṣeta. param anādṛtya etad
SA15dhkhetuu:463: evaṃ hy anena ātmanaḥ sāmarthyaṃ darśitaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:464: bhavati. kāryaṃ param apekṣata iti tataḥ kevalād anutpattir
SA15dhkhetuu:466: sa kevalo api samartha-svabhāva iti tata utpattiṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:467: brūṣe, ete ca ekatra kathaṃ syātām. tad ayam īrśyā-śalya-vitudyamāna-
SA15dhkhetuu:468: marmā viklavaṃ vikrośati ity upekṣām arhati.
SA15dhkhetuu:473: yatra tu santāna-upakāreṇa bhāvā hetutāṃ pratipadyante
SA15dhkhetuu:481: na hi taṇḍula-ādīnāṃ dahana-ādau krameṇa svabhāva-
SA15dhkhetuu:485: akṣepa-kāriṣu tv indriya-ādiṣu na viśeṣa-utpattiḥ parasparataḥ.
SA15dhkhetuu:489: hetutāṃ pratipadyanta iti tatra eka-arthakriyā eva sahakāritvam.
SA15dhkhetuu:490: yatra viśeṣa-utpādanena sahakāriṇaḥ pratyayās tatra hetu-
SA15dhkhetuu:491: santānaḥ pratyayān apekṣata iti tataḥ svabhāva-antara-pratilambha-
SA15dhkhetuu:493: tebhya eva viśiṣṭa-kṣaṇa-utpādāt krameṇa yāvad atiśayavato
SA15dhkhetuu:496: eva utpattir na yuktā. aviśiṣṭād viśeṣa-utpattau kāryasya api
SA15dhkhetuu:497: syāt; paraspara-viśeṣa-utpādān apekṣiṇo api sahakāriṇaḥ kāryaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:498: kurvīran. tena akṣaṇikānām api sahakāry-anapekṣāṇāṃ kāraṇatā
SA15dhkhetuu:499: syāt, apekṣaṇīyebhyaḥ svabhāva-atiśaya-utpattiś ca na syāt. atha
SA15dhkhetuu:500: sahakāriṇā kṛta-viśeṣa eva viśeṣa-utpādāv apy upatiṣṭheta; evam
SA15dhkhetuu:501: anavasthā syāt. na ca sahakāriṇaḥ paraspara-kārya-utpāda-anuguṇa
SA15dhkhetuu:502: viśeṣa-utpādane nityaṃ yogya-avasthā yena eṣāṃ paraspara-
SA15dhkhetuu:505: viraha-darśanāt. tena ādyo viśeṣaḥ sahakāribhyo nirupakārasya
SA15dhkhetuu:507: na asmākaṃ punaḥ punar vacane kaścid
SA15dhkhetuu:509: yady evam api lokasya nyāya-pratītir bhavati,
SA15dhkhetuu:510: hanta tarhy ucyatām. na viśeṣa-utpādanād eva sahakāriṇāṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:511: sahakāritvāṃ yatas tad-abhāvād viśeṣa-janane sahakāriṇo na
SA15dhkhetuu:512: syuḥ. kiṃ tarhi. eka-arthakriyāyā api. sa api bhavet parasparato
SA15dhkhetuu:516: viśeṣa-bhāvi kāryam api kevalād bhavet iti cet,
SA15dhkhetuu:518: aparāparaiḥ pratyayair yathā bhāva-santāne viśeṣa-utpattir yogya-
SA15dhkhetuu:519: deśatā-ādy-avasthā-viśeṣāṇāṃ ca kārya-karaṇaṃ teṣāṃ ca yata
SA15dhkhetuu:520: utpattiḥ pratyekaṃ ca sāmarthye api yathā kevalānām akriyā-
SA15dhkhetuu:524: bhedād iti sarvam uktam. tatra sahakāribhyaḥ santāna-upakāra-
SA15dhkhetuu:530: na anavasthā. tathā yady akṣaṇiko api bhāva ādya-viśeṣa-kāraṇa-vad
SA15dhkhetuu:536: api tathā syād ity uktam atat-svabhāvas tu tadā apy akāraka eva.
SA15dhkhetuu:537: tasmād akṣaṇikānāṃ kāraṇānāṃ na eka-arthakriyayā kaścit
SA15dhkhetuu:538: sahakāritva-niyamo na api santāna-upakāreṇa iti na tasya kaścit sahakārī;
SA15dhkhetuu:539: tasmāt kevalo api kuryāt. prāyas tu saṃghāta-sthāyī bhāva-
SA15dhkhetuu:544: ucyate. kārakasya svabhāvasya prāg api bhāvo akriyā na yujyate.
SA15dhkhetuu:545: tasmād yo yad-ātmā sa sattā-mātreṇa tādṛśo bhavati;
SA15dhkhetuu:546: na bhūtvā tad-bhāve para-abhisaṃskāram apekṣate. svabhāvato
SA15dhkhetuu:551: kartum aśakyatvāt. anyathātva-pratipattau vā tat-svabhāva eva
SA15dhkhetuu:552: na syād iti pūrva eva vikalpaḥ,
SA15dhkhetuu:553: tatra ca uktam. yaś ca parasmād
SA15dhkhetuu:554: anyathābhāvaḥ so aparaḥ svabhāvaḥ yaś ca aparaḥ sa kathaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:555: tasya, svabhāva-bheda-lakṣaṇatvād bhāva-bhedasya. tathā ca pūrvako
SA15dhkhetuu:556: bhāvo acyuti-dharme sthita iti na tasya anyathābhāvaḥ.
SA15dhkhetuu:558: svabhāva-antara-utpattiḥ pratyuktā. tatra api pūrvakasya sva-rasa-nirodhitvād
SA15dhkhetuu:559: vināśe agny-āder upādānāc ca apara eva drava-ādi-svabhāva-
SA15dhkhetuu:564: na ca vināśo nāma aparaḥ svabhāvaḥ,
SA15dhkhetuu:567: dvayam atikrāmati. kiṃ nityo bhāvaḥ svabhāvena āhosvid anityo iti
SA15dhkhetuu:568: vikalpe prāṅ nityo bhūtvā paścād anityo bhavati iti bruvāṇaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:570: bhāva-dvayaṃ ca svayaṃ ca nāśam anāśaṃ ca prāha iti
SA15dhkhetuu:571: pūrvasmin vināśa-hetur asamarthaḥ. na prāṅ nityo bhūtvā paścād
SA15dhkhetuu:572: anityo bhavati. kiṃ tarhi. paścād api nityo eva,
SA15dhkhetuu:574: sa tarhi bhāvaḥ svabhāvena nāśam anāviśan kathaṃ naṣṭo
SA15dhkhetuu:576: tasmāt saty asya vināśe vināśa-svabhāvena anena bhavitavyam.
SA15dhkhetuu:577: tathā api vyartho vināśa-hetur ity uktam. tena svabhāvato
SA15dhkhetuu:578: naśvare anaśvare vā bhāve na vināśa-hetor upayogaḥ.
SA15dhkhetuu:579: tasmād vināśe anapekṣo bhāvas tad-bhāva-niyata iti yaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:583: svabhāvato naśvaratve api kaścid atat-svabhāvo api syāt, na
SA15dhkhetuu:584: hi sarvaḥ sarvasya svabhāva iti na anvaya-vyatireka-siddhir iti cet,
SA15dhkhetuu:585: na, akṣaṇikatve avastutva-prasaṅgāt. śaktir hi bhāva-lakṣaṇam,
SA15dhkhetuu:586: sarva-śakti-viraho abhāva-lakṣaṇam. na ca akṣaṇya kvacit kācic
SA15dhkhetuu:588: sat tat kṣaṇikam eva iti vyāpti-siddhiḥ.
SA15dhkhetuu:594: kāryaṃ svabhāvair yāvadbhir avinābhāvi kāraṇe, teṣāṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:596: tair eva ca dharmair ye tair
SA15dhkhetuu:597: vinā na bhavanti. aṃśena janyajanakatva-prasaṅga iti cet, na,
SA15dhkhetuu:600: kasyacit kadācit kutaścit bhāve api sarvas tādṛśas tathāvidha-
SA15dhkhetuu:601: janmā iti kuto avasitam. tathā ca na anvaya-vyatirekāv iti cet,
SA15dhkhetuu:602: na, atad-bhāvinas tasya sakṛd api tato abhāvāt. paraspara-apekṣayā
SA15dhkhetuu:606: svabhāvo na bhavati iti sakṛd api tato na bhaved arthāntara-vat,
SA15dhkhetuu:609: vat. na ca dhūmasya tad-ataj-janya-svabhāvo yuktaḥ,
SA15dhkhetuu:616: viśeṣa-janitaḥ so dhūma iti kārya-kāraṇayor evaṃ svabhāva-niyamāt
SA15dhkhetuu:617: tad vijātīyād utpattir na bhavati. tat kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:618: na vyabhicarati. tena siddhe kāryakāraṇabhāve kāryasya
SA15dhkhetuu:620: nanu vijātīyād api kiṃcid bhavad dṛṣṭam, tad yathā
SA15dhkhetuu:621: gomaya-ādeḥ śālūka-ādiḥ. na vijātīyād utpattiḥ. tathāvidham
SA15dhkhetuu:622: eva hi tādṛśām ādi-nimittam iti na kāraṇa-bhedaḥ. prabandhena
SA15dhkhetuu:623: vṛttau tu śarād bhavati. asti ca gomaya-itara-janman-svabhāva-
SA15dhkhetuu:628: jāti-bheda-darśanāt. anyathā hi vilakṣaṇāyā api sāmagryā
SA15dhkhetuu:630: abhedāv ity ahetukau viśvasya bheda-abhedau syātām. tathā
SA15dhkhetuu:631: hi na bhedād bheda ity abhedād api na abhedaḥ,
SA15dhkhetuu:633: ca na kaścid bhāva-svabhāva ity ahetukatvād bhāvānāṃ nityaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:636: bhāvāḥ kādācitkā bhavanti vyavasthāvāṃś ca sādhyeṣu
SA15dhkhetuu:637: sādhana-niyogo na syāt. kāraṇa-śakti-pratiniyame hi kiṃcid eva
SA15dhkhetuu:643: taj-janana-svabhāva-vilakṣaṇād api tasya utpattau na taj-janana-
SA15dhkhetuu:645: śakti-sāmye tu tad eva iti na kāryaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ kāraṇaṃ vyabhicarati.
SA15dhkhetuu:655: yogyatā eva anupalabdhiḥ pūrvavat. yatra yasminn upalabhyamāne
SA15dhkhetuu:656: niyamena yasya upalabdhir bhavati yogyatāyā aviśeṣāt,
SA15dhkhetuu:661: eka-jñāna-saṃsargiṇoḥ paraspara-apekṣam eva anyatvam iha abhipretam,
SA15dhkhetuu:663: tad-anya iti taj-jñānaṃ tat-svabhāvo vā jñātṛ-jñeya-dharma-
SA15dhkhetuu:670: vṛttyā apekṣāto abhāvo anupalabdhiś ca anupalabdhiḥ. na pratiṣedha-
SA15dhkhetuu:672: prasaṅgāt. tasya asaṃsṛṣṭa-rūpasya bhāva-siddhir eva aparasya abhāva-
SA15dhkhetuu:673: siddhir ity anyabhāvo api tad-abhāva iti vyapadeśyate.
SA15dhkhetuu:675: vyavahāraṃ sādhayet tat-siddhi-siddho vā tad-abhāva iti
SA15dhkhetuu:678: syāt. sa eva anyabhāvas tad-viṣayā ca upalabdhis tad-abhāvasya
SA15dhkhetuu:686: agni-vat. anyabhāva-siddhyā eva tad-abhāvaḥ prasidhyati, tasya
SA15dhkhetuu:689: sambandha-abhāvāc ca. tac ca tasya liṅgaṃ yadi syāt, tasya
SA15dhkhetuu:692: samavāyo dhūmasya liṅginaś ca eka-artha-samavāyo vā ādhārādheyabhāvo
SA15dhkhetuu:693: vā janyajanakabhāvo vā. na evaṃ kaścid bhāva-abhāvayoḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:696: asti viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ śabda-artha-sambandha-vad iti cet, śabda-
SA15dhkhetuu:697: arthayos tat-pratipādana-abhiprāye sati tat-prayogāt tena saha
SA15dhkhetuu:699: ayaṃ ca atra na sambhavati iti kathaṃ viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ syāt.
SA15dhkhetuu:700: siddhe hi tayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāve tan-mukhena viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:701: syāt; sa eva asati sambandhe na sidhyati;
SA15dhkhetuu:703: viṣayaviṣayibhāvo api na. anyathā itaretara-āśrayam idaṃ syāt.
SA15dhkhetuu:704: anyabhāvāc ca abhāva-siddhāv asamudāyaś ca sādhyaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:705: syāt. tathā ca ghaṭa-abhāvas tad-anyabhāvād iti ghaṭasya sarvatra
SA15dhkhetuu:708: cet; pradeśa-ādi-dharmi-viśeṣaṇa-bhūto abhāvaḥ sādhyate, na tu
SA15dhkhetuu:709: kevalaḥ; tato na asamudāyasya sādhyatā. na ca liṅga-liṅginor
SA15dhkhetuu:712: pradeśa-āder eva anyabhāvatvāt. yatra eva hi
SA15dhkhetuu:713: pradeśe yan na asti ity ucyate sa eva tena asaṃsṛṣṭo anyabhāvaḥ.
SA15dhkhetuu:714: tad-darśanād eva asya ghaṭo na asti iti vikalpa iti kathaṃ tasya eva
SA15dhkhetuu:716: na ca atra sāmānya-viśeṣa-bhāva-kalpanā sambhavati, yena
SA15dhkhetuu:717: sāmānyaṃ hetur bhavet viśeṣo dharmī iti,
SA15dhkhetuu:719: tad-abhāvasya pratītes tasya ca anyatra anya-abhāvāt. pratijñārthaikadeśatvāc
SA15dhkhetuu:720: ca na hetutvam. na ca yatra pradeśa-mātraṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:721: tatra ghaṭa-abhāvaḥ. tādṛśe kevale pradeśe abhāva eva iti cet,
SA15dhkhetuu:722: nanu tasya eva kevala iti ghaṭa-viraha iti. sa ca liṅgabhūta-
SA15dhkhetuu:723: pradeśa-pratipattāv eva siddhaḥ. kasya idānīṃ tal liṅgam. anvayasya
SA15dhkhetuu:724: anugamanaṃ ca nirarthakam. tasmād anyabhāvo na sādhanam
SA15dhkhetuu:730: kiṃ nu vai pratiyogī pramātum iṣṭo,
SA15dhkhetuu:732: sambandhaḥ syāt. abhāvas tu pratiyogino ghaṭasya anyabhāvena aviruddhaḥ,
SA15dhkhetuu:734: virodhaḥ. tasmāt sambandha-abhāvaḥ. atra apy asamudāya-sādhyatvaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:737: gatyā api tad-abhāva-gatir na syād iti cet,
SA15dhkhetuu:744: tasya kaivalyam aparasya vaikalyam iti tad-anyabhāva
SA15dhkhetuu:747: iti. anyathā tasya paricchedena tato anyasya avyavacchede
SA15dhkhetuu:750: vyavahāraḥ kasyacid darśanāt kvacit prāpti-parihāra-arthaḥ, sa
SA15dhkhetuu:751: na syāt. na hy ayam analaṃ paśyann api kevalam analam
SA15dhkhetuu:760: pratipattiḥ. tasya tato vā anyasya kasyacid apy apratipattāv
SA15dhkhetuu:762: pṛṣṭhībhava-ādy-avasthāsv apy abhāvaḥ kiṃ na pratīyate. bhūyo api
SA15dhkhetuu:763: vicāritaṃ pramāṇaviniścaye. tasmād ayam analaṃ paśyann apy
SA15dhkhetuu:764: analo ayaṃ na salilam ity anadhyavasyan na tiṣṭhen na api
SA15dhkhetuu:765: pratiṣṭheta iti dustaraṃ vyasanaṃ pratipannaḥ syāt.
SA15dhkhetuu:766: tata eva ekasya darśanād anya-abhāva-gatir bhavati iti cet,
SA15dhkhetuu:767: katham ekaṃ dṛṣṭam anyan na asti iti pratyāyayati. kevalasya
SA15dhkhetuu:771: paruṣam iva ābhāti. tasmāt tīra-adarśinā eva śakuninā paryaṭā
SA15dhkhetuu:772: api pratyāgantavyam ity alam avidyamāna-pratiṣṭhānayā diśaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:774: yady eka-paricchedād eva anya-vyavacchedaḥ sidhyati, sarvasya
SA15dhkhetuu:783: tad-anyasya ātmā bhavati. anya-ātmano avyavacchede pravṛtti-
SA15dhkhetuu:784: nivṛttyor abhāva iti pūrvaḥ prasaṅgaḥ. taṃ ca deśa-kāla-svabhāva-
SA15dhkhetuu:786: pracyutim asya vyavacchinatti. evaṃ hi sa tayā paricchinno
SA15dhkhetuu:787: yady anyathābhāvo vyavacchinno bhavati tathātvaṃ ca
SA15dhkhetuu:788: tasya eva bhavati na anyasya ity anyathābhūtād vyavacchindaty
SA15dhkhetuu:789: eva tat paricchinatti. evam ekasya pramāṇasya vṛttiḥ sarva-
SA15dhkhetuu:797: tasmāt kvacit pramāṇaṃ pravṛttaṃ tat paricchinatti
SA15dhkhetuu:799: sūcayati iti eka-pramāṇa-vyāpāra eṣaḥ. tathā hi kvacit pramāṇaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:803: tatra aparicchedāt. atas tad eva pramāṇaṃ prakāra-antara-abhāvaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:804: sādhayati, tasmin dṛśyamāne adṛṣṭasya tad-anyatvena sarvasya
SA15dhkhetuu:805: vyavasthāpanād atad-anyasya eva ca tattvena vyavasthāpanāt.
SA15dhkhetuu:807: tad evaṃ ekasya upalambhāt tasya tad-anya-ātmano vyavacchedaḥ,
SA15dhkhetuu:808: na tad-deśa-kālayoḥ sarvasya anyasya bhāvasya vyavacchedaḥ.
SA15dhkhetuu:809: tasmād atadātmā ca syāt tad-deśa-kālaś ca,
SA15dhkhetuu:811: vat. tasmād yathoktād eva anupalambhāt kvacit kadācit
SA15dhkhetuu:813: anyabhāva-viṣaya-upalabdhir api tad-abhāvasya sādhikā iṣṭā eva,
SA15dhkhetuu:817: siddheḥ. na hy anyabhāvaṃ pratipadya tat-pratipatter anvaya-
SA15dhkhetuu:818: vyatirekau prasādhya tad-abhāvaṃ pratipadyate. kiṃ tarhi.
SA15dhkhetuu:820: darśana-anantaraṃ vyavadhānena vinā idam asti idaṃ tu na asti iti
SA15dhkhetuu:822: dṛṣṭānta-asiddheḥ. tac ca tasya liṅgaṃ yad
SA15dhkhetuu:823: yasya anvayi vyatireki ca. na hy evaṃ śakyaṃ darśayituṃ yatra anya-
SA15dhkhetuu:826: abhāvāt. sāmānyena pradarśane dṛṣṭānte api pramāṇa-antara-abhāvāt
SA15dhkhetuu:827: sā eva tad-anyabhāva-upalabdhiḥ sādhya-dharmasya sādhikā iti
SA15dhkhetuu:829: tasmān na kutaścil liṅgād abhāva-siddhiḥ. so anyabhāvaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:832: sā iyaṃ tridhā anupalabdhiḥ. siddhe kāryakāraṇabhāve
SA15dhkhetuu:836: anyabhāva-siddher eva. sa tatra asiddhaḥ kārya-vyāpyayor abhāvam
SA15dhkhetuu:837: abhāva-vyavahāraṃ vā sādhayati. svabhāva-anupalabdhau tv anupalabdhyā
SA15dhkhetuu:841: ca sādhayataḥ sā ca anupalabdhis tayor upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-
SA15dhkhetuu:844: arthe prayogaḥ. na eva prayogaḥ pramāṇatayā,
SA15dhkhetuu:847: parasya avaśyam abhāva-niścaya iti darśana-artham ete prayujyete.
SA15dhkhetuu:848: ity eṣa pakṣa-dharmo anvaya-vyatirekavān iti tad-aṃśena
SA15dhkhetuu:849: vyāptas tri-lakṣaṇas trirūpa eva hetur gamakaḥ, sva-sādhya-
SA15dhkhetuu:851: ṣaḍ-lakṣaṇo hetur ity apare. trīṇi ca etāny abādhita-viṣayatvam
SA15dhkhetuu:853: tatra abādhita-viṣayatvaṃ tāvat pṛthag lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati,
SA15dhkhetuu:854: bādha-avinābhāvayor virodhāt. avinābhāvo hi saty eva sādhya-
SA15dhkhetuu:855: dharme bhāvo hetoḥ. sa hetus tal-lakṣaṇo dharmiṇi syāt, atra
SA15dhkhetuu:856: ca sādhya-dharmaḥ kathaṃ na bhavet. pratyakṣa-anumāne hi
SA15dhkhetuu:858: tasmin saty eva hetur bhavaṃs taṃ tatra eva dharmiṇy avasthāpayati
SA15dhkhetuu:859: iti paraṃ bata bhāvānām asvāsthyam. anyatra
SA15dhkhetuu:860: sādhya-dharmeṇa avinābhāvī hetur na dharmiṇy eva iti cet, tat
SA15dhkhetuu:861: kim ayaṃ tapasvī ṣaṇḍham udvāhya putraṃ mṛgyate. yasya
SA15dhkhetuu:862: dharmiṇy asaty api sādhya-dharme bhāvas tam upadarśya
SA15dhkhetuu:863: kathaṃ sa dharmī sādhya-dharmavān ity ucyate. ata eva bādhā
SA15dhkhetuu:865: yata eva hetur anyathā api bhavet, ata
SA15dhkhetuu:866: eva pramāṇābhyām abādhita-dharmā dharmī ity ucyate iti tat
SA15dhkhetuu:867: kim idānīṃ hetoḥ sāmarthyam abādhayā eva sādhya-siddheḥ.
SA15dhkhetuu:872: abhāvāt. aniyame na ca bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ syāt sādhya-abhāvasya
SA15dhkhetuu:873: ca sambhava iti na sāmarthyam abādhāyāḥ.
SA15dhkhetuu:874: na bādhāyā abhāvo abādhā. kiṃ tarhi. bādhāyā anupalabdhiḥ.
SA15dhkhetuu:875: sā ca puruṣasya kvacid bādha-asambhave api syād iti sa
SA15dhkhetuu:876: hetu-prayogasya viṣayaḥ. kiṃ nu vai hetur bādha-upalabdher api
SA15dhkhetuu:879: prayoktavya iṣṭaḥ. sa tarhi hetuḥ paramārthena
SA15dhkhetuu:880: bādhā kim asti na asti ity anapekṣya bādhā-anupalabdhau prayoktavyaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:881: kim arthaṃ prayujyate. sādhya-siddhy-artham. sa kiṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:882: kvacit satyām api bādhāyāṃ sādhyaṃ sādhayet,
SA15dhkhetuu:884: niścayaṃ prati yatno na kriyate hetuś ca prayujyate. tathā
SA15dhkhetuu:885: ca abādhita-viṣayatvaṃ hetu-lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati, bādhāyām
SA15dhkhetuu:893: na bādhāyāṃ satyāṃ sāmarthyam iti cet, yady evaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:895: prayogaṃ na arhati. bādhā-anupalambhe sāmarthyam iti cet, kim
SA15dhkhetuu:898: kṛtam asāmarthyaṃ na sambhavet. atha tan-nivṛttau bādhā
SA15dhkhetuu:899: nivartate, tathā api bādhā-anupalambhād eva sādhya-siddher vyartho
SA15dhkhetuu:900: hetuḥ, anupalambhe bādhāyā asambhavāt. upalambhasya nivṛttāv
SA15dhkhetuu:901: api bādhāyā anivṛttau tad-avasthaṃ hetor asāmarthyam
SA15dhkhetuu:902: ity aprayogaḥ. tasmāt sva-sādhya-bhāva-abhāvābhyām anyathā api
SA15dhkhetuu:903: bhavan hetur dharmiṇi kiṃcin na bhāvayati na vibhāvayati ity
SA15dhkhetuu:904: upakṣepo na samarthaḥ. tan na bādhā-avinābhāvau sahāvasthitau;
SA15dhkhetuu:907: vā bhavet, yasya bhāve api yasya anyasya abhāvaḥ. tad yathā
SA15dhkhetuu:908: pakṣadharmatvaṃ sapakṣe ca bhāva iti. na ca etad bādhāyā avinābhāve
SA15dhkhetuu:909: sati sambhavati iti na sādhya-viparyaya-avibhāvinor hetu-viruddhayor
SA15dhkhetuu:910: viṣaye bādhā sambhavati iti na tad-abhāvaḥ pṛthag
SA15dhkhetuu:911: anayor lakṣaṇa-antaratvena vācyaḥ. tasmād hetoḥ prayoge
SA15dhkhetuu:912: pratijñāyā doṣāṇāṃ sambhavo na asti. na api kevalā pratijñā
SA15dhkhetuu:914: etena eka-saṃkhyā-vivakṣā api pratyuktā. katham. eko hi sva-
SA15dhkhetuu:915: sādhya-bhāva eva bhāvāt tad-avyabhicārī. tatra eva tasmād anyas
SA15dhkhetuu:916: tad-bādhakasya eva bhāvāt tad-viruddha ity atra bādhayā
SA15dhkhetuu:918: api ca kiṃ vastuto asambhavat-pratihetuḥ sa samyag-jñāna-
SA15dhkhetuu:919: viparyaya-hetur āhosvid apradarśita-pratihetuḥ kiṃ ca ataḥ.
SA15dhkhetuu:922: etat. hetv-abhāvo vā. na hy aniścita-ātmanaḥ pratipādaka-dharmasya
SA15dhkhetuu:924: na api sandigdha-lakṣaṇo hetur bhavati iti na kaścid hetur
SA15dhkhetuu:925: bhavet. tulya-lakṣaṇe hi dṛṣṭaḥ pratiyogi-sambhavo adṛṣṭa-
SA15dhkhetuu:930: sva-sādhyaṃ niścāyayati ity atal-lakṣaṇo na hetuḥ syāt. tathā ca
SA15dhkhetuu:932: hīyeta svalakṣaṇa-yuktayor hetvor ekatra dharmiṇi virodhena upanipāte
SA15dhkhetuu:933: viruddhāvyabhicārī iti. na ca tasya viśeṣasya svarūpaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:936: utpaśyāmaḥ. tasmān na asty eva viśeṣa iti sarvatra śaṅkayā
SA15dhkhetuu:938: dṛṣṭa-pratihetor api hetoḥ prāg itareṇa na kaścid
SA15dhkhetuu:939: viśeṣo lakṣyate. na ca sambhavat-pratihetūnām api sarvadā
SA15dhkhetuu:941: atiśayavatī tu prajñā-utprekṣiṇī dṛṣṭā. tena aniścayaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:949: hetuṃ kṛtakatva-ādi kaścin na darśayed iti. idam aprakāśyam
SA15dhkhetuu:950: apy asaṃvaraṇīyam api iti kaṣṭhataraṃ vyasanam āyātaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:951: kathaṃ nirvoḍhuṃ śakyeta. sa tāvad ayaṃ hetur vastūni
SA15dhkhetuu:955: vastūni tāṃś ca puruṣān tadbhāva-sampadaḥ pracyāvya-
SA15dhkhetuu:956: bhraṣṭa-rājya iva rājā tapovanaṃ gacchati iti kiṃ atra brūmaḥ.
SA15dhkhetuu:957: puruṣa-pratibhākṛtaṃ ca sādhanatvam. tat kiṃ vastutaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:958: sādhanam asādhanaṃ vā. sa ca hetuḥ svabhāvatas tad-dharma-bhāvī
SA15dhkhetuu:962: ca katham anyadā api sādhanaṃ kasyacit.
SA15dhkhetuu:968: bhaviṣyati. kiṃ-rūpāl liṅgād artho jñātavya iti cintāyāṃ pratipattur
SA15dhkhetuu:972: pratyayāt pravṛttim avalambate. tathā yad asya ātma-rūpaṃ tal
SA15dhkhetuu:973: lakṣaṇam, na tu pararūpam. pratipatti-janmany upayoga-mātrāt
SA15dhkhetuu:976: na hi teṣv asatsu liṅgini jñānaṃ bhavati.
SA15dhkhetuu:977: niścita-grahaṇaṃ tarhi na kartavyam. na na kartavyam,
SA15dhkhetuu:979: hetum icchatāṃ na eva samartho hetur bhavati, sator api
SA15dhkhetuu:981: gamaka iti jñāpana-arthaṃ niścita-grahaṇam. tena pararūpaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:992: sattā-vyavasthāyās tayor eva sattā-prasiddher iti sarvatra
SA15dhkhetuu:993: sattā-vyavasthā eva tat-sādhanaṃ pramāṇam ākarṣati. parārthatvāc
SA15dhkhetuu:995: arthasya iti tad rūpaṃ ye na vidanti,
SA15dhkhetuu:1002: anvaya-vyatirekayoḥ sattāyāṃ saṃśayāt. tasmād yataḥ sattā-
SA15dhkhetuu:1003: prasādhaka-pramāṇād anayor niścayas tad-adhīnā iti jñāpana-artham
SA15dhkhetuu:1006: pṛthag ato jñānaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati,
SA15dhkhetuu:1011: iti cet, na, hetoḥ sapakṣa-asapakṣayor bhāva-abhāvayor aparaspara-
SA15dhkhetuu:1012: ākṣepāt; ekaṃ vākyam ubhayaṃ gamayati ity ucyate,
SA15dhkhetuu:1013: na eko artho dvitīyasya. nanu tatra eva bhāvo tad-abhāve
SA15dhkhetuu:1014: ca abhāva iti vākye paraspara-ākṣepa iti cet,
SA15dhkhetuu:1017: ubhayam ākṣipati na punaḥ kevalau bhāva-abhāvāv ākṣipataḥ;
SA15dhkhetuu:1020: tasmāt tatra eva bhāva iti na bhāva eva ucyate,
SA15dhkhetuu:1022: eva, yena bhāvo abhāvo vā dvitīyam ākṣipet. na evaṃ jñānaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:1023: para-upalakṣaṇāt trailakṣaṇyād vyatirekitam iti na lakṣaṇa-antaram.
